pkgmetadata.longdescription: Approximate Bayesian Computation via Random Forests // Performs Approximate Bayesian Computation (ABC) model choice and parameter inference via random forests. Pudlo, P., Marin, J.-M., Estoup, A., Cornuet, J.-M., Gautier, M. and Robert, C.P. (2016) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btv684. Raynal, L., Marin, J.-M., Pudlo, P., Ribatet, M., Robert, C.P. and Estoup, A. (2017) arXiv:1605.05537.
